titles: Here begynneth the testame[n]t of Iohn Lydgate monke of Berry which he made hymselfe, by his lyfe dayes.
author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
publisher: In fletestrete, by Richard Pynson: printer vnto the kynges noble grace,
notes: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
The last leaf bears a woodcut on recto and printer's mark on verso.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
